modName: Immortal Victoria STANDALONE FOLLOWER with GLOWING EYES
summary: The First STANDALONE FOLLOWER with GLOWING EYES. No other mods required. Victoria is an Ancient Powerful Vampire who doesn't have the weaknesses of normal Vampires and have glow in the dark eyes.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=red]MEET VICTORIA[/color][/heading]

[heading][size=+2]The First Standalone Follower with [color=purple]GLOWING EYES[/size][/color][/heading]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/44969-0-1445446282.jpg[/img]

[color=yellow]STORY[/color]:
Victoria's background is shrouded in complete mystery. All is known is that she is one of the original ancient Vampires. Even the known ancient Vampires in existence was unaware of her existence. It's believed that since the beginning, Victoria has been trapped deeply hidden in the planes of Oblivion.

But now she's in skyrim with the power to make a daedric Prince envy her.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/44969-0-144544[/img]

[color=yellow]LOCATION[/color]:
The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.

I would have loved to make some custom armor befitting for Victoria, but I have no idea how to do that... lol. So when you find her, make sure you bring some clothes.

[color=yellow]BODY TYPE[/color]:
CBBE v3... My favorite XD

[color=yellow]POWERS[/color]:
Victoria wields a host of powerful magic that I will let you find out when you take her on a adventure, lets put it this way... if the odds are against you, you will want Victoria on your side... trust me. And she has the Marked for death shout because DEATH is her specialty.

She levels with you from 1-150max, but Victoria has a big head start because she's special... lol.

[color=yellow]INSTALLATION[/color]:
Install using NMM, or just simply drop the files into the Skyrim Data folder in there respective places.

[color=yellow]PERMISSIONS[/color]:
This is a NEXUS EXCLUSIVE so please don't re-upload it to another site. But feel free to use my mod otherwise, as long as you CREDIT ME and LEAVE A LINK TO MY MOD PAGE, Thanks.

[color=yellow]CREDITS[/color]:

Calientes for my favorite body mod- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?]CBBE[/url]

xs2reality for a wonderful athletic muscle mod- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13377//?]Sporty Sexy Map[/url]

dumle35 for the best glowing eye mod that I used as reference
found here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21232//?]Skyrim - Glowing Eyes v4[/url]

automatik25 for tattoo and eye textures.

And navetsea for outstanding work.

And Bethesda for a wonderful game.

[color=red]Note:[/color] [u]With some enb's The eyes may not glow as intended, I Do not use ENB's so I have not tested it on which ENB would be fine and which would not be fine[/u].


[color=green]Last but not least[/color]:

[b]If you like my mod can you come back and endorse it,.... Thanks.[/b] : )

P.S. Upload your best pics they are more than welcome, I'm not good at taking pictures.

And if you like my mod, you know what to do.

And check out my other standalone follower mods: Midnight

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26369/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/26369-1-1389599619.jpg[/img][/url]

and Oblivion

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43187/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/43187-1-1389598005.jpg[/img][/url]

and Ra

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50721/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50721-1-1391470816.jpg[/img][/url]

And check out my Spell Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50868/?]Atom Bomb - Ultra Powerful Spell[/url]

And the armor in the pics is- Thunderbird armor by ken1945

and The Witcher 2 - Eilhart Dress by Nimezis


[color=yellow]AND YOU ARE WELCOME TO UPLOAD YOUR PICTURES EVERYONE. Thanks.[/color]

[color=yellow][size=+2]Thanks to everyone who supports my mods.[/color][/size]
